titleStmt.title: A brief commentarie or exposition upon the prophecy of Obadiah, together with usefull notes / delivered in sundry sermons preacht in the church of St. James Garlick-Hith London. By Edward Marbury, the then pastor of the said church.
titleStmt.author: Marbury, Edward, 1581-ca. 1655.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by T.R. and E.M. for George Calvert and are to be sold at the signe of the Halfe-Moone in Watling-street neere Pauls-stump,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: the signe of the Halfe-Moone in Watling-street neere Pauls-stump
